channel.title: Version 7 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 7.6.0 (XXXX-XX-XX) New New The menu configuration for the main menu area, introduced in 7.1.0, is extended to the non-scrolling menu header area between search box and main scrolling area using the sidebarheadermenus option and to the menu footer area using the sidebarfootermenus option.
